(Armor Negating [armornegating], Magic Resistance Negates [mrnegates], Ignores Shields [ignoreshield], No Effect on Undead [undeadimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], No effect on Inanimate [inanimateimmune], Internal Damage [internal])
The spell boils the blood of the chosen victim. This spell uses much power from the Path of Fire and is one of the few Blood magic spells that doesn't require huge amounts of sacrificial blood.
